info.name: DEPRECATED - Flickr WideScreen - (GM) - Flickr SET
info.description: DEPRECATED - IMPORTANT (2020): It should be better to use now (more updated) ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey ▶ Please Comment and give Feedback if you like this Style :-)
info.additionalInfo: ▶ Lien Test : Usuono's Set It's for a WIDESCREEN(1920x1080)! It's a part of my "Flickr WideScreen Collection". ▶ My Flickr ALLinONE styles: - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 1): the first and principal to install - Flickr Widescreen - ALLinONE (Part 2): Adaptation for GM (Adaptation for some great Userscripts i use a lot , since a long time...), and Additional styles for some some unused pages. - - Flickr WideScreen - Dark & Grey - For Flickr Viewers : ► Flickr WideScreen - FlickrHiveMind ► Flickr WideScreen - DACKR Viewer ▷▷▷ Firefox Addons and Greasemonkey Scripts (GM) for Flickr. Read here which Flickr Greasemonkey Script (GM) you can use : "My BIG List Of Scripts", in "Flickr Hacks". ▷ Thumbnail Preview With: ▶ Thumbnail Zoom Plus( Firefox Addon) Very Good addon to use on many sites too.
